job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Job Title: Machine Learning Support (Fulltime)<br>Location: Washington<br><br>EXP: 0-5 Years<br><br>JD: Summary View<br><br>• Minimum 3 + years’ Experience on programming languages such as C#, Java & C++. <br>• Experienced and fully engaged in Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).<br>• Design, code and debug applications in various software languages<br>• Experience in a technical role such as software engineer, solutions engineer, or similar. <br>• Knowledge on Code analysis, requirements analysis, software review, identification of code metrics, system risk analysis, software reliability analysis<br>• Good communication skills and ability to articulate tech issues accurately and succinctly in a manner that business users can understand and support.<br>• Azure Knowledge is an added advantage.<br>• Experience in production support and customer interaction<br>• Delivers Professional Services to sound technical, business, and professional standards while ensuring strong customer satisfaction and success. <br>• Provides technical design and construction expertise to Customer implementations and deployments. <br><br><br><br><br>• Soft Skills<br>o Leadership - handle technically challenging and politically sensitive customer situations<br>o Strong communications skills – Excellent spoken and written English communication skills <br>o Effective, polished interaction with customer to gather information quickly; explain customer responsibilities in resolving issue; communicate next steps and status; and inspire confidence<br>o The successful Support Engineer has the drive and intellectual horsepower to resolve difficult customer issues; directly supports customers through telephone, email, and chat services as applicable<br>o Demonstrable troubleshooting skills<br>o Cross-team collaboration<br><br>• Azure Cognitive & Machine Learning Skills<br>• Experience on C#, Jave and C++ <br>• Basic knowledge on Windows Azure cloud platform (IaaS and PaaS) and Azure CLI & Azure PaaS, Storage, IaaS, Resource Groups and other services.<br>• Experience in production support and customer interaction <br>• Experience analyzing telemetry and logs <br>• Good debugging skills <br>• Experience in production support and customer interaction <br>• Willingness to learn and adapt<br><br>• Time of operation: This track will be in 24X7 shift model. Therefore, candidates should be flexible to cover during holidays and weekends to accommodate MS roster<br><br> <br>Skill Requirement: (list top 3-4 skills):<br><br>Technical / Soft Skills Expertise Level (Expert / Good / Knowledge)<br>C# and Java Expert<br>C++ Good<br>Communication Skills Expert<br>Azure Good <br>
